title: Garamendi’s Committee Assignments Announced, Including New Roles in Aviation and Counterterrorism | Congressman John Garamendi
snippet: The Congressman will serve his constituents on the Transportation & Infrastructure and Armed Services committees. He is well positioned to support needs of the district, including levee construction and supporting Travis and Beale Air Force Bases.

title: Committees and Caucuses | Congressman John Garamendi
snippet: Congressman John Garamendi represents his constituents on the Committee on Armed Services and the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure in the U.S.
